Title: Noi tre
Writer: Pupi Avati (story), Antonio Avati (story), Cesare Bornazzini (dialogue collaboration)
Actors: Cristopher Davidson, Lino Capolicchio, Gianni Cavina, Carlo Delle Piane
Plot: Young W.A. Mozart is hosted in a villa near Bologna, where he has to graduate. There he gets in touch with "normal" boys, falls in love for the first time and tries to escape his destiny of young genius.
